title: Veterans Leading in Agriculture & Entrepreneurship [Sustainable Farming]

tasks.task: Farmer's morning routine and facilities tour
subtasks: Explaining roosting bars and egg collection boxes
Highlighting the chicken coop's features (hand-built by the farmer's husband)
Observing chickens coming out after being let out in the morning
Touring the farm and explaining its purpose
Sharing the farmer's background and motivations for starting the farm
Discussing the impact of the farm on mental health and healing
Explaining the difference between their eggs and conventional store-bought eggs
Promoting their business and inviting support from fellow veterans
Discussing the importance of sustainable and regenerative farming practices
Teaching viewers about rotational grazing and its benefits
Encouraging small farmers to share their story and products
